body_html:
Not sure why a cmake upgrade should be troublesome? At least not on windows, for linux I can understand as the package manager aptitude for Ubuntu 16 only gives you cmake 3.5. But this toolset feature is not needed on linux, hence the if(WIN32).

This example might give an idea on how you can do it without the cmake upgrade: https://github.com/facebook/hhvm/blob/master/CMake/VisualStudioToolset.cmake

I have not tested this, so it would have to be verified that it actually does what it claims. Also, the example is only for visual studio 2017, and would have to be expanded for other VS versions.
